question: Which are the basin countries of "Essequibo River"?
explanation: Guyana and Venezuela are the basin countries of "Essequibo River". The Essequibo River is the largest river in Guyana and the largest river between the Orinoco and Amazon. Rising in the Acarai Mountains near Brazilâ€“Guyana border, the Essequibo flows to the north through forest and savanna into the Atlantic Ocean.
